titleStmt.title: The most elegant and witty epigrams of Sir Iohn Harrington, Knight digested into foure bookes: three vvhereof neuer before published.
titleStmt.author: Harington, John, Sir, 1560-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] P[urslowe] for Iohn Budge: and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Greene Dragon,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Sir Iohn Harringtons epigrams.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Greene Dragon
